author1: (Hatzivassiloglou & McKeown, 1997; Pang, Lee, & Vaithyanathan, 2002; Pang & Lee, 2008; Turney, 2002)
content1: Nowadays, many people make their opinions available on the internet and researchers have been proposing methods to automate the task of classifying these textual reviews/opinions as positive or negative (Hatzivassiloglou & McKeown, 1997; Pang, Lee, & Vaithyanathan, 2002; Pang & Lee, 2008; Turney, 2002).
content2: a performance evaluation of ANN on a full version of the benchmark dataset of Movies reviews (Pang & Lee, 2004)
